title: Applied AI: How Businesses Actually Use LLMs
description: Cut through the hype to see how companies are deploying AI today. Learn what works, what fails, and how to evaluate real-world AI solutions for your organization.
targetAudience: Business professionals, product managers, and leaders evaluating AI adoption and implementation
keyTakeaways: Identify which AI use cases deliver real ROI today
Understand the build vs. buy decision for AI capabilities
Recognize common implementation pitfalls and how to avoid them
Evaluate AI vendors and solutions with informed questions
Spot overhyped claims vs. practical applications
